content:
**materials ** j & p coats or clark s o n t best six cord mercerized crochet size 30 * j & p coats small ball 85 balls of white or ecru or 114 bails of any color *or* * clark s o n t small ball 136 balls of white ecru or any color *or* * j & p coats big ball 43 balls of white or ecru * steel crochet hook no 10 or 11 **gauge ** each motif measures 3-1/4 inches 8 3 cm square and 4-1/4 inches 10 8 cm diagonally
**finished size ** tablecloth measures 66 x 88 inches 168 x 224 cm and requires 636 motifs
